Description:
Learn how the latest innovations in Windows 365 Frontline and Cloud PC devices such as Windows 365 Link can boost productivity, strengthen security and improve end-user experience while helping you optimize IT investments. From manufacturing, to retail, to call centers, discover how new capabilities and offerings for Windows in the cloud including purpose-built devices can unlock efficiencies in shared spaces.

Delivered in a silent stage breakout.

Chapters: 0:00 - Opening and Introduction to Live Demos 00:00:52 - Demo Setup Issues and Switch to Windows 365 Cloud PC 00:15:00 - Transition to David presenting Windows 365 Link 00:20:14 - Simplified device setup, management, and update process for Windows 365 Link 00:23:40 - Shared and dedicated use scenarios for Lync devices 00:24:28 - Demo: Riley the factory supervisor logs into shared Cloud PC 00:32:07 - Expanding Windows 365 Frontline beyond traditional worker roles 00:32:25 - Examples: University use and contractor access with Windows 365 Frontline 00:34:45 - Demonstration: ordering a part using Windows 365 Cloud Apps on iPad

Title: Unlock efficiencies with Windows 365 Frontline & Cloud PC devices | BRK342
